top..route-product-product:not(.popup) .site: min-height: var(--min-height-top, var(--min-height)); padding: var(--breadcrumbs-top-padding, 0) 0 var(--breadcrumbs-bottom-padding, 0) 0 !important

below..product-info .product-details .product-: position: relative; width: auto; height: auto;

side..product-info .product-details .product-: position: relative; width: auto; height: auto;

fixed..route-product-product:not(.popup) .prod: position: fixed; z-index: 99; bottom:0; margin: 0; transition: bottom 350ms 350ms ease-out;

scroll..route-product-product:not(.popup) .prod: position: fixed; z-index: 99; bottom:0; margin: 0; transform: translate3d(0,100%,0); transition: bottom 350ms 350ms ease-out, transform 400ms 350ms ease-out;
